Title: Judicators with Skybolt Bows
Legend: No foe can escape the keen gaze of the Judicators. Granted the ability to sense corruption, the storm of arrow fire unleashed by their skybolt bows fells ranks of enemies with relentless and merciless precision.
Intro: Each model in a Judicators with Skybolt Bows unit is armed with a Skybolt Bow and Storm Gladius. 1 in every 5 models can replace their Skybolt Bow with a Shockbolt Bow.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thunderhead Brotherhood • Vanguard Wing

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Judicator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Skybolt Bow or Shockbolt Bow.

Rules.Name: Celestial Blast
Rules.Fluff: Skybolt bows can unleash a deadly blast of celestial energy when they strike a foe.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Skybolt Bow is 6, the target suffers 1 mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
